title: Kill count

properties.name: description
properties.value: Kill count, or killcount (also referred to as KC), is a unique system in both Barrows and the God Wars Dungeon (referred to as Essence).

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Kill count
"Kills" redirects here. For when a player has no Hitpoints left, see Death.

Kill count, or killcount (also referred to as KC), is a unique system in both Barrows and the God Wars Dungeon (referred to as Essence).

Contents

  • 1 Barrows
  • 2 Acquiring essence in God Wars Dungeon
    • 2.1 Saradomin
    • 2.2 Zamorak
    • 2.3 Bandos
    • 2.4 Armadyl
    • 2.5 Zaros
  • 3 Slayer

Barrows[edit | edit source]

Main article: Barrows/Strategies

Killcount is also used in the Barrows crypts. This applies to the common creatures in the crypts, and killing them adds to the reward potential obtained from looting the chest, increasing the drop rate and quantity of items such as blood runes and other miscellaneous items.

Acquiring essence in God Wars Dungeon[edit | edit source]

In the God Wars Dungeon, kill count is referred as essence in-game. Here, players must have slain 40 followers of the god they follow in order to access the general's chambers. This can be decreased to 38, 36, 33 and 30 kills required with completion of the Hard, Elite, Master and Grandmaster task sets respectively. The player can also bypass the requirement in full with an Ecumenical key. If the player has sufficient essence, it takes higher priority than the key for being used.

The generals and their bodyguards are also counted as essence. Leaving the dungeon completely (apart from logging out inside the dungeon) will remove all essence the player had obtained.

Saradomin[edit | edit source]

Main article: Commander Zilyana/Strategies

The weakest Saradominist followers that could be killed for essence are Knights of Saradomin. Saradomin priests, Saradominist Spiritual warriors, Spiritual rangers and Spiritual mages could also be killed for the purpose. Killing 40 of these grants access to Commander Zilyana and her bodyguards, Starlight, Growler and Bree.

Zamorak[edit | edit source]

Main article: K'ril Tsutsaroth/Strategies

The weakest Zamorakian followers that could be killed for essence are imps. Bloodvelds, vampyres, hellhounds, werewolves, pyrefiends, icefiends, goraks, Zamorakian Spiritual warriors, Spiritual rangers and Spiritual mages could also be killed for the purpose. Killing 40 of these grants access to K'ril Tsutsaroth and his bodyguards, Tstanon Karlak, Balfrug Kreeyath and Zakl'n Gritch.

Bandos[edit | edit source]

Main article: General Graardor/Strategies

The weakest Bandosian followers that could be killed for essence are goblins, specifically the level 12 variety. Ogres, jogres, hobgoblins, orks, cyclops, Bandosian Spiritual warriors, Spiritual rangers and Spiritual mages could also be killed for the purpose. Killing 40 of these grants access to General Graardor and his bodyguards, Sergeant Strongstack, Sergeant Steelwill and Sergeant Grimspike.

Armadyl[edit | edit source]

Main article: Kree'arra/Strategies

The weakest Armadylean followers that could be killed for essence are Aviansies, specifically the level 73 or 79 variety. Armadylean Spiritual warriors, Spiritual rangers and Spiritual mages could also be killed for the purpose. Killing 40 of these grants access to Kree'arra and his bodyguards, Flight Kilisa, Wingman Skree and Flockleader Geerin.

Zaros[edit | edit source]

Main article: Nex/Strategies

Unlike the other factions, the essence amount obtained from those in the Ancient Prison varies depending on the monster killed:

  • Spiritual warriors and spiritual rangers, as well as Nex's mages, provide two essence per kill.
  • Blood Reavers provide three essence, with the occasional chance for four.
  • Spiritual mages provide five essence, with the occasional chance for six.
  • Nex provides five essence, with the occasional chance for six.

Slayer[edit | edit source]

The Slayer ring, helm, or (eternal) gem keeps track of kills in Slayer. Using any of said items brings up a log recording every Slayer monster the player kills, but it maximises out at 65,535 kills.

{{external|rs}}{{redirect3|Kills|For when a player has no [[Hitpoints]] left, see [[Death]]}}
'''Kill count''', or '''killcount''' (also referred to as '''KC'''), is a unique system in both [[Barrows]] and the [[God Wars Dungeon]] (referred to as '''Essence''').

==Barrows==
{{Main|Barrows/Strategies}}
Killcount is also used in the [[Barrows]] crypts. This applies to the common creatures in the crypts, and killing them adds to the reward potential obtained from looting the chest, increasing the drop rate and quantity of items such as [[blood rune]]s and other miscellaneous items.

==Acquiring essence in God Wars Dungeon==
In the God Wars Dungeon, kill count is referred as essence in-game. Here, players must have slain 40 followers of the god they follow in order to access the general's chambers. This can be decreased to 38, 36, 33 and 30 kills required with completion of the [[Combat Achievements/Hard|Hard]], [[Combat Achievements/Elite|Elite]], [[Combat Achievements/Master|Master]] and [[Combat Achievements/Grandmaster|Grandmaster]] task sets respectively. The player can also bypass the requirement in full with an [[Ecumenical key]]. If the player has sufficient essence, it takes higher priority than the key for being used.

The generals and their bodyguards are also counted as essence. Leaving the dungeon completely (apart from logging out inside the dungeon) will remove all essence the player had obtained.

===Saradomin===
[[File:Saradomin symbol.png|left|60px]]
{{Main|Commander Zilyana/Strategies}}
The weakest [[Saradomin]]ist followers that could be killed for essence are [[Knight of Saradomin|Knights of Saradomin]]. [[Saradomin priest]]s, Saradominist [[Spiritual warriors]], [[Spiritual rangers]] and [[Spiritual mages]] could also be killed for the purpose. Killing 40 of these grants access to [[Commander Zilyana]] and her bodyguards, [[Starlight]], [[Growler]] and [[Bree]].

===Zamorak===
[[File:Zamorak symbol.png|left|60px]]
{{Main|K'ril Tsutsaroth/Strategies}}
The weakest [[Zamorak]]ian followers that could be killed for essence are [[imps]]. [[Bloodvelds]], [[vampyres]], [[hellhounds]], [[werewolves]], [[pyrefiends]], [[icefiends]], [[gorak]]s, Zamorakian [[Spiritual warriors]], [[Spiritual rangers]] and [[Spiritual mages]] could also be killed for the purpose. Killing 40 of these grants access to [[K'ril Tsutsaroth]] and his bodyguards, [[Tstanon Karlak]], [[Balfrug Kreeyath]] and [[Zakl'n Gritch]].

===Bandos===
[[File:Bandos symbol.png|left|60px]]
{{Main|General Graardor/Strategies}}
The weakest [[Bandos]]ian followers that could be killed for essence are [[goblins]], specifically the level 12 variety. [[Ogres]], [[jogre]]s, [[hobgoblins]], [[ork]]s, [[cyclops]], Bandosian [[Spiritual warriors]], [[Spiritual rangers]] and [[Spiritual mages]] could also be killed for the purpose. Killing 40 of these grants access to [[General Graardor]] and his bodyguards, [[Sergeant Strongstack]], [[Sergeant Steelwill]] and [[Sergeant Grimspike]].

===Armadyl===
[[File:Armadyl symbol.png|left|60px]]
{{Main|Kree'arra/Strategies}}
The weakest [[Armadyl]]ean followers that could be killed for essence are [[Aviansies]], specifically the level 73 or 79 variety. Armadylean [[Spiritual warriors]], [[Spiritual rangers]] and [[Spiritual mages]] could also be killed for the purpose. Killing 40 of these grants access to [[Kree'arra]] and his bodyguards, [[Flight Kilisa]], [[Wingman Skree]] and [[Flockleader Geerin]].

===Zaros===
[[File:Zaros symbol.png|left|60px]]
{{Main|Nex/Strategies}}

Unlike the other factions, the essence amount obtained from those in the Ancient Prison varies depending on the monster killed:
* [[Spiritual warrior]]s and [[spiritual ranger]]s, as well as Nex's mages, provide two essence per kill.
* [[Blood Reaver]]s provide three essence, with the occasional chance for four.
* [[Spiritual mage]]s provide five essence, with the occasional chance for six.
* [[Nex]] provides five essence, with the occasional chance for six.

==Slayer==
The [[Slayer ring]], [[Slayer helmet|helm]], or ([[Eternal gem|eternal]]) [[Slayer gem|gem]] keeps track of kills in [[Slayer]]. Using any of said items brings up a log recording every [[Slayer monster]] the player kills, but it maximises out at 65,535 kills.
